page.title: 08POPULATION IN GODMERSHAM
page.content: TOTAL POPULATION 237 ADULTS 195 CHILDREN UNDER 18 420 O.A.P.s 57 64% of the population is concentrated in Godmersham village,along the A28 Canterbury Road and the lanes leading off it,The Street,Purr Wood, Eggarton Lane, Park Lane and Pope Street. The remaining 36% lives in the outlying districts to the north, East Stour Farm, Mountain Street, Dane Street, Young Manor Farm and Cutlers Farm. In recent years conversion of farm buildings and oast houses to dwelling houses, or sale of farm land to create larger units has produced some increases in population. However there has been no significant increase since the erection of 8 council houses in Purr wood shortly after the last war.
